Basic Information.name: Unique ID
Basic Information.help: Global unique ID of this object.

Basic Information.name: Unique Name
Basic Information.help: Global unique Name of this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner ID
Basic Information.help: ID of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner Group ID
Basic Information.help: ID of group of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Original Object ID
Basic Information.help: ID of source object of this object, if this object is a copy of an existing object.

Basic Information.name: Child Object IDs
Basic Information.help: ID of all child objects, if this object is a container object.

Basic Information.name: ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter a unique identifier used in your lab.

Basic Information.name: Description
Basic Information.help: Please enter detailes about this solution.

Basic Information.name: Use of Solution
Basic Information.help: Please indicate in which experiment the solution was used. Example: HBS buffer, used for calcium phosphate-mediated transient transfection of eukaryotic cells

Basic Information.name: Components
Basic Information.help: Please enter all components [link to chemical substances database] of the solution with the corresponding concentrations. Example: HBS buffer NaCl: 137mM, Glucose: 60 mM, HEPES: 200 mM, KCl: 50mM, Na2HPO4: 7mM

Basic Information.name: pH
Basic Information.help: Please enter the pH of the solution and how it was adjusted: Example: adjusted to pH 7.2 with NaOH

Basic Information.name: Solvent
Basic Information.help: Please enter the solvent used. Example: the components were solved in H2O

Basic Information.name: Storage
Basic Information.help: Please enter the site where the solution is stored.

Basic Information.name: Origin
Basic Information.help: If applicable enter the name of the distributor (lab, company), from whom the solution was obtained.

Basic Information.name: Product ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter the product number of substance.

Additional Information.name: Contact Person
Additional Information.help: Please enter the names and departments of the contact persons or principal investigators who are responsible for this entry and should be contacted for further questions.

Additional Information.name: Aliquots Sent To
Additional Information.help: Please enter when and to whom aliquots have been sent.

Additional Information.name: Notes
Additional Information.help: Please enter and link all further information which is important to the solution.
